Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class VehicleTypesController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.VehicleTypesController
@Controller public class VehicleTypesController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with Vehicle Types.
Since:
2/1/2022
Author:
Logan Kirkwood llk1005@sru.edu

  • Method Details

    • showVehicleTypeList

      @RequestMapping("/vehicletypes") public String showVehicleTypeList(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds all of the vehicle types to the "vehicletypes" model and redirects user to the vehicletypes page.
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "locations"

    • showVehicleTypeSignUpForm

      @RequestMapping("/signupvehicletype") public String showVehicleTypeSignUpForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model, VehicleTypes vehicleTypes, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Redirects user to the /add/add-location page
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      vehicleTypes - Used to store the information on the vehicle type being added
      result - Ensures the information provided by the user is valid
      Returns:
      "/add/add-vehicletype"

    • addVehicleType

      @RequestMapping("/addvehicletypes") public String addVehicleType(@Validated VehicleTypes vehicleTypes, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds a vehicle type to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the vehicle type is saved in the vehicleTypesRepository. and the user is redirect to /vehicletypes
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /add/add-vehicletype page.
      Parameters:
      vehicleTypes - Information on the vehicle type being added
      result - Ensure the information provided by the user is valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/vehicletypes" or "/add/add-vehicletype"

    • deleteVehicleType

      @GetMapping("/deletevehicletype/{id}") public String deleteVehicleType(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a vehicle type using the id parameter and if found, redirects to confirmation page If there are dependency issues, the vehicle is not deleted and an error is displayed to the user.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the vehicle type being deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/vehicletypes"

    • deleteContactConfirmation

      @GetMapping("/deletevehicletypeconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteContactConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a vehicle type using the id parameter and if found, deletes the vehicle type and redirects to vehicle types page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the vehicle type being deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/contacts"

    • viewVehicleType

      @GetMapping("/viewvehicletype/{id}") public String viewVehicleType(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a location using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that location to the locations page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the vehicle type being viewed
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "locations"

    • showEditForm

      @GetMapping("/editvehicletype/{id}") public String showEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a vehicle type using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that vehicle type to a form and redirects the user to that update form.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the vehicle type being edited
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "update/update-vehicletype"

    • updateVehicleType

      @PostMapping("/updatevehicletype/{id}") public String updateVehicleType(@PathVariable("id") long id, @Validated VehicleTypes vehicleType, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates a vehicle type to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the vehicle type is updated in the vehicleTypesRepository. and the user is redirect to /vehicletypes
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /update/update-vehicletype page.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the vehicle type being updated
      vehicleType - Information on the vehicle type being updated
      result - Ensures the information entered by the user is valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/vehicletypes" or "/update/update-vehicletype"
